text: Ara tadera kache se janapadera abastha samparke jijnesa kara ya chila nadira tire abasthita. Yakhana sanibara dinera nirdesera byapare simatikrama karate lagala, yakhana asate lagala machagulo tadera kache sanibara dina panira upara, ara yedina sanibara hata na, asata na. Ebhabe ami taderake pariksa karechi. Karana, tara chila napharamana.
